verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> there this <S%H1697>word<s%>,

And <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that <S%H3427>sittest<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, thou, and thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and thy <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H935>enter<s%> in by these <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H6213>Execute<s%> ye <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6216>oppressor<s%>: and do no <S%H3238>wrong<s%>, do no <S%H2554>violence<s%> to the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, nor the <S%H490>widow<s%>, neither <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

For if ye <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H6213>indeed<s%>, then shall there enter <S%H935>in<s%> by the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H7392>riding<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and on <S%H5483>horses<s%>, he, and his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

But if ye will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%>, I <S%H7650>swear<s%> by myself, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that this <S%H1004>house<s%> shall become a <S%H2723>desolation<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; Thou art <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> unto me, and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>: yet surely I will <S%H7896>make<s%> thee a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are not <S%H3427%H3427>inhabited<s%>.

And I will <S%H6942>prepare<s%> <S%H7843>destroyers<s%> against thee, every <S%H376>one<s%> with his <S%H3627>weapons<s%>: and they shall cut <S%H3772>down<s%> thy <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%>, and <S%H5307>cast<s%> them into the <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> by this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, Wherefore hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> thus unto this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>?

Then they shall <S%H559>answer<s%>, Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> them.

¶ <S%H1058>Weep<s%> ye not for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>, neither <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> him: but <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H1058>sore<s%> for him that goeth <S%H1980>away<s%>: for he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> no more, nor <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H4138>native<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>touching<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which <S%H4427>reigned<s%> instead of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, which went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of this <S%H4725>place<s%>; He shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> thither any more:
But he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> whither they have led him <S%H1540>captive<s%>, and shall <S%H7200>see<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%> no more.

¶ <S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto him that <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3808>by<s%> <S%H6664>unrighteousness<s%>, and his <S%H5944>chambers<s%> by <S%H4941>wrong<s%>; that useth his <S%H7453>neighbour's<s%> <S%H5647>service<s%> without <S%H2600>wages<s%>, and <S%H5414>giveth<s%> him not for his <S%H6467>work<s%>;

That <S%H559>saith<s%>, I will <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H4060>wide<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H7304>large<s%> <S%H5944>chambers<s%>, and cutteth him <S%H7167>out<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%>; and it is <S%H5603>cieled<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%>, and <S%H4886>painted<s%> with <S%H8350>vermilion<s%>.

Shalt thou <S%H4427>reign<s%>, because thou <S%H8474>closest<s%> thyself in <S%H730>cedar<s%>? did not thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>justice<s%>, and then it was <S%H2896>well<s%> with him?

He <S%H1777>judged<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>; then it was <S%H2896>well<s%> with him: was not this to <S%H1847>know<s%> me? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

But thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> are not but for thy <S%H1215>covetousness<s%>, and for to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and for <S%H6233>oppression<s%>, and for <S%H4835>violence<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> concerning <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; They shall not <S%H5594>lament<s%> for him, saying, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%>! or, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%>! they shall not <S%H5594>lament<s%> for him, saying, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> <S%H113>lord<s%>! or, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> his <S%H1935>glory<s%>!

He shall be <S%H6912>buried<s%> with the <S%H6900>burial<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass<s%>, <S%H5498>drawn<s%> and cast <S%H7993>forth<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

¶ Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, and <S%H6817>cry<s%>; and lift <S%H5414>up<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, and <S%H6817>cry<s%> from the <S%H5676>passages<s%>: for all thy <S%H157>lovers<s%> are <S%H7665>destroyed<s%>.

I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto thee in thy <S%H7962>prosperity<s%>; but thou <S%H559>saidst<s%>, I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%>. This hath been thy <S%H1870>manner<s%> from thy <S%H5271>youth<s%>, that thou <S%H8085>obeyedst<s%> not my <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

The <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall eat <S%H7462>up<s%> all thy <S%H7462>pastors<s%>, and thy <S%H157>lovers<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>: surely then shalt thou be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for all thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>.

O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, that makest thy <S%H7077>nest<s%> in the <S%H730>cedars<s%>, how <S%H2603>gracious<s%> shalt thou be when <S%H2256>pangs<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon thee, the <S%H2427>pain<s%> as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail<s%>!

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, though <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were the <S%H2368>signet<s%> upon my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, yet would I <S%H5423>pluck<s%> thee thence;

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them whose <S%H6440>face<s%> thou <S%H3016>fearest<s%>, even into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>.

And I will cast thee <S%H2904>out<s%>, and thy <S%H517>mother<s%> that <S%H3205>bare<s%> thee, into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, where ye were not <S%H3205>born<s%>; and there shall ye <S%H4191>die<s%>.
But to the <S%H776>land<s%> whereunto they <S%H5375%H5315>desire<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%>, thither shall they not <S%H7725>return<s%>.

Is this <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> a <S%H959>despised<s%> <S%H5310>broken<s%> <S%H6089>idol<s%>? is he a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein is no <S%H2656>pleasure<s%>? wherefore are they cast <S%H7993>out<s%>, he and his <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and are <S%H2904>cast<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> which they <S%H3045>know<s%> not?
O <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H3789>Write<s%> ye this <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6185>childless<s%>, a <S%H1397>man<s%> that shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3117>days<s%>: for no <S%H376>man<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%>, <S%H3427>sitting<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H4910>ruling<s%> any more in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
